string.text:
%c[0,153,255,255]Advanced Weapon Repair (AWR)%c[0,140,140,140] allows the player to repair his/her weapon at a mechanic's workshop\vice. 
 
%c[0,0,255,30]Information 
%c[0,140,140,140]Instead of paying mechanics to repair your weapons, you can use their vices to do the repair yourself as long as you have the required gears. 
The repair procedure is affected by the overall quality of the weapon (new, worn, rusty) and its current condition. Moreover, the terms 0-65, 0-75 and 0-85 determine the weapon status for each of the quality types: 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]0-65% for rusty weapons. 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]0-75% for worn weapons. 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]0-85% for new weapons. 
 
%c[0,0,255,30]Required items and tools 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]Replacement parts (should be suitable for your weapons. You can get them by disassembling similar weapon types using the %c[255,238,153,26]Multitool%c[0,140,140,140]) 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]Weapon repair kit 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]Weapon modification kits 
 
%c[0,0,255,30]Repair and upgrade procedure 
%c[0,140,140,140]Replacing parts when repairing weapons with a low state occurs in a certain sequence: 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]At condition 0-20/0-25/0-30% - Replacement of barrel 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]At condition 20-35/25-45/30-55% - Replacement of trigger (shock-trigger mechanism) 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]At condition 35-45/45-60/55-70% - Replacement of breech head 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]At condition 45-55/60-70/70-80% - Replacement of gas tube 
%c[0,200,0,255]Х %c[0,140,140,140]At condition 55-65/70-75/80-85% - Replacement of breech block 
 
%c[0,153,255,255]The procedure goes like this: 
%c[0,204,0,51]1Х %c[0,140,140,140]Disassemble your weapon at a mechanic's vice. 
%c[0,204,0,51]2Х %c[0,140,140,140]Select a %c[255,238,153,26]weapon repair kit%c[0,140,140,140] to replace the weapon barrel with another barrel of the same caliber, this can be also done by using a %c[255,238,153,26]weapon upgrade kit%c[0,140,140,140] in a condition from 20-65%/25-75%/30-85%. Double click on the kit to apply the repair procedure. 
%c[0,204,0,51]3Х %c[0,140,140,140]Select a %c[255,238,153,26]Weapon modification kit%c[0,140,140,140] to replace the rest of parts in the list. 
%c[0,204,0,51]4Х %c[0,140,140,140]Click on the image of the part that is being currently replaced (the part selected for the replacement that is available for replacement is indicated by a green light). Attempting to replace one part spends one charge of the %c[255,238,153,26]Weapon modification kit%c[0,140,140,140] (keep in mind that a modification kit can be used 3 times) 
%c[0,204,0,51]5Х %c[0,140,140,140]In case the replacement is successful, this procedure is repeated for all parts in the specified order 
%c[0,204,0,51]6Х %c[0,140,140,140]In case the part has been damaged, try again if there is a repair kit and any more weapon parts. 
%c[0,204,0,51]7Х %c[0,140,140,140]All replaced parts are retained until the condition of the weapon is lowered. In this case, to improve the quality, the parts will need to be replaced anew. 
%c[0,204,0,51]8Х %c[0,140,140,140]When all five parts have been replaced, the quality of the weapon will be changed to the corresponding one. On that note, if at least one of the replaced items has been worn out, the quality of the weapon will be changed to "worn", even if other weapon parts are replaced with new ones.

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing weapon barrels of smooth-bore double-barrel at a mechanic's workshop. Includes a set of precision calibers grade 2 accuracy, a micrometer, as well as a set of special tools and a soldering kit. Can only be used to replace 12 gauge barrels at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise
12mm hammer type double-barrel shotgun repair kit

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of double-barreled shotguns at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 12mm caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of semi-automatic rifles and shotguns at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 12mm caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of semi-automatic rifles at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 7.62 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of German semi-automatic rifles at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 7.92 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of automatic rifles at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 9mm caliber or, при расточке, the .45 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise
9mm weapon repair kit for silenced weapons [ј/PP]

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of submachine guns and automatic rifles with integrated silencers at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 9mm caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of automatic weapons at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 7.62 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of Soviet submachine guns at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 7.62 caliber caliber at a mechanic's workshop.

%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military item
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of automatic weapons at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 5.45 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.

%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of automatic weapons at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 5.56 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.

%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing barrels of machine guns at a mechanic's workshop. It can only be used with parts of the 7.62 caliber at a mechanic's workshop.

%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A special kit with tools designed for replacing weapon parts. It can only be used at a mechanic's workshop.
 
%c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140]
 
%c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] mechanic's vise

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A worn but functional multitool, used to disassemble weapons and armor on parts and to maintain worn and rusty trigger mechanisms. 
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:%c[0,140,140,140] 
 %c[0,100,100,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] military part 
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]AUXILIARY MATERIALS: 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] gun lubricants %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] gasoline %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] kerosene %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] cloth or rags %c[0,170,170,170]

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]A file, used to restore weapon parts such as a worn or rusty barrel or breech head. 
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]AUXILIARY MATERIALS: 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] gun lubricants %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] industrial grease %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] kerosene %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] cloth or rags %c[0,170,170,170]

%c[0,0,255,30]Information
%c[0,140,140,140]An old ramrod consisting of three composite wooden parts, used to restore parts such as worn or rusty barrels and gas tubes. 
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]AUXILIARY MATERIALS: 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] cleaning solvents %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] gasoline %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] kerosene %c[0,170,170,170] 
 %c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] cloth or rags %c[0,170,170,170]
Sliding bolt carrier with turning bolt lock [Russia]
Sliding bolt carrier with turning bolt lock [Russia]
Sliding bolt carrier with turning bolt lock [NATO]
Sliding bolt carrier with a locking bias
Sliding bolt carrier with locking bolt
Lever type bolt carrier with locking wedge
Sliding bolt carrier with turning bolt lock [NATO]
Ejector from an over-under double barrel shotgun [R]
Supercharger with hammer from a double-barrel shotgun [R]
Hammers from a hammer-type double-barrel shotgun [R]
Double fire mode trigger mechanism with hammer
Triple fire mode trigger mechanism with hammer
Single fire mode trigger mechanism with firing pin
Double fire mode trigger mechanism with firing pin
